thread.section_title: FloraQueen opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre FloraQueen | www.floraqueen.com
thread.title: John Harrison

author: John Harrison
title: John Harrison
text:
I found the ordering system very easy, prices were equal to anything I could buy locally but the fact delivery was included helped to make my choice. They are also Lyoness listed which ment i got a reward for shopping with them which was a big factor.
The only reason I have not given top ratting is the Lyoness reward was cancelled and I have emailed the company and still not got a responce
